story_alola_01_13000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Regarding what we were discussing the
other day...
story_alola_01_13000/2401_1001_0200_10: I, Faba, promise to meet your expectations—
story_alola_01_13000/2401_1001_0500_10: Miss Lillie and Young Master Gladion?!
story_alola_01_13000/2401_1001_0600_10: P-please e-e-excuse me! I’ll call back later!
story_alola_01_13000/2401_1001_0700_10: I see you’ve been contacting someone in secret.
story_alola_01_13000/2401_1001_0900_10: What a rude assumption! This is a private matter!
story_alola_01_13000/2401_1001_1000_10:
If you have nothing to hide, then show us your
call history.
story_alola_01_13000/2401_1001_1300_10: If I say that I can’t, I mean I that can’t!
story_alola_01_13000/2401_1001_1400_10:
I’m afraid we have no choice but to get a
bit rough...
